<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109709</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109709</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Coherent light sources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohärente Lichtquellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sources lumineuses logiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fontes claras coherent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fonti di luce coerenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνεπείς πηγές φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuentes de luz coherentes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations demonstrate how a single light beam from a laser (top) is split into two coherent light beams as it passes through two slits (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coherent light sources</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">laser beam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phase shift</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slits</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen, wie ein einzelner 
Lichtstrahl von einem Laser (Oberseite) in zwei zusammenhängende 
Lichtstrahlen aufgespaltet wird, während er durch zwei Schlitze 
(Unterseite) überschreitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations démontrent comment un faisceau 
lumineux simple d'un laser (dessus) est coupé en deux faisceaux 
lumineux logiques pendant qu'il traverse deux fentes (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações demonstram como um único 
feixe luminoso de um laser (alto) está rachado em dois feixes 
luminosos coherent enquanto passa através de duas réguas (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni dimostrano come un singolo 
raggio di luce da un laser (parte superiore) è diviso in due raggi di
luce coerenti mentre attraversa due fessure (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις καταδεικνύουν πώς μια ενιαία 
ελαφριά ακτίνα από ένα λέιζερ (κορυφή) είναι χωρισμένη σε δύο
συνεπείς ελαφριές ακτίνες καθώς περνά μέσω δύο σχισμών 
(κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones demuestran cómo un solo rayo
de luz de un laser (tapa) está partido en dos rayos de luz coherentes
mientras que pasa a través de dos rajas (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kohärente Lichtquellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Laserstrahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phasenänderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sources lumineuses logiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayon laser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">déphasage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fentes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fontes claras coherent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">feixe de laser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslocamento de fase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">réguas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fonti di luce coerenti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fascio laser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">di sfasamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fessure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συνεπείς πηγές φωτός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακτίνα λέιζερ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετατόπιση φάσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχισμές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuentes de luz coherentes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rayo laser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">desplazamiento de fase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rajas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
